title: sorry guys but i feel like no one hears me when im here
body: i just think of all the games and all they wanna do is take towers and focus out the game. when is the last time someone asked me how are you, or good luck have fun. League is just toxic i dont care anymore.

replies.body: I always say glhf and enjoy chatting in game, find other nice people to duo with :)
Thats why i prefer to johin a club and play with them :) or friends solo play is not the best especialy if its not a gamemode or ARAM :)

i play lol 6 years already i think.. and now.. wow i play srsly long XD...
i encountered just ONCE a guy who got me on the edge.. he was enemy and he was tilting me so he can win lane more easy ... idk why someo people even master provocation :(

but the rest... all gut :D unless you get iritated by shitsuo and the windwalls and the infinite jumps like me :D
This is why i wished age bracketing was possible, so all the antisocial 13-year-old males could have their own lobbies, but sadly it is about 20 years too late for that to work.
